name: Rewind Slime
description:
A slime want more power, he went to the ruins to get The Artifact of Zong, apparently, he can use rewind to move platform , and he can backtrack when he fall to the pit or get crushed by platform itself. Go little Slime, to the top!

source 

- background = sunnyland asset
- tilemap = https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas
